mapper.select: select o.order_id oid, o.order_price op, p.product_name pn, p.product_price pp, po.quantity poq from `order` o inner join `productorder` po on o.order_id = po.order_id inner join product p on p.product_id = po.product_id

select o.order_id oid, o.order_price op, p.product_name pn, p.product_price pp, po.quantity poq from `order` o inner join `productorder` po on o.order_id = po.order_id inner join product p on p.product_id = po.product_id where o.order_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update `order` o set o.order_price = ( select SUM(op.quantity * p.product_price) from productorder op inner join product p on p.product_id = op.product_id where o.order_id = op.order_id ) where o.order_id = #{order_id};
